changelog: New！ Sendspin audio streaming—turn any Android device into a whole-home audio terminal. Bidirectional Opus/PCM streaming, real-time metadata, vinyl cover animation, multi-room sync via Music Assistant. Adjustable wake word sensitivity for any environment. Fixed REMOTE_CACHING error on ESPHome covers (#27). Fixed front camera 90° rotation in landscape. Log spam reduced—BTHome and Sendspin throttled. Memory optimized. Note: author traveling, 3.3 has new features but potential undiscovered bugs; use 3.2 for stability if needed.
